item.description:
THE ART OF READING FACES WORKSHOP with Tony & Jen

SOME OF WHAT YOU WILL LEARN IN THE FACE READING WORKSHOP
*How each individual feature & part of the face speaks language of its own
*The forehead indicates through which you perceive the world
*The eyes are our point of view and the nose "knows" your personality
*About left/right brain function & how it is expressed in male/female energy
*Face structure indicates the potential for our personality's performance
*How self awareness creates self acceptance, confidence & self esteem

During the workshop a picture of your face is taken and a face split analysis done to show your projection of male/female energy, these pictures can bring a deep emotional awareness.

AS YOU LEARN THE ART OF READING A FACE YOU ARE ALSO LEARNING TO CONNECT TO YOURSELF AND OTHERS AT A SOUL LEVEL. YOU'LL COME TO APPRECIATE YOUR OWN UNIQUENESS, YOUR OWN SOUL'S PURPOSE AND THIS CREATES THE SPACE IN YOUR LIFE FOR YOU TO BE WHO YOU CAME HERE TO BE AND TO ACCEPT AND GIVE OTHERS THE SAME SPACE AS THEY WALK THEIR OWN INDIVIDUAL SOUL'S JOURNEY. THIS EXPERIENTIAL WORKSHOP CAN ENHANCE YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH YOURSELF AND OTHERS, IT HELPS YOU BECOME MORE PRESENT, MORE CONNECTED TO YOUR BODY, MORE CONNECTED TO YOUR FEELINGS AND MORE CONNECTED TO YOUR LIFE.

CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED, PLEASE REGISTER EARLY
This is a full 10 hour course (9:30am-7:30pm); bring a lunch or purchase a scrumptious organic meal provided through the The Growing Green Co-op & Alchemy Cafe (please indicate preference on registration form); organic snacks provided

COST: $325, organic lunch an additional $15

PLEASE FEEL FREE TO FORWARD THIS TO YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY
Get Into your body . . . out of your mind.
Learn to let go of your conditioning, while gaining Awareness, Acceptance and taking Action
item.name: Art of Reading Faces - Workshop
